text: was a Japanese actor, tarento, and businessman. He was represented by the agency Pickles. His daughter is model and tarento Anna Umemiya. The son of a doctor, Umemiya gave up a medical career to debut as a Toei New Face at the Toei Studios. As an actor, he appeared in films and television dramas and also in restaurant variety shows. Umemiya died of kidney failure on 12 December 2019. He was 81 years old.俳優の梅宮辰夫さん死去 81歳Japanese actor Tatsuo Umemiya dies at 81 ==Filmography== {|class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Role !
